She is nicknamed "Marianne the Flash" for her piloting skills, having been the test pilot for the Ganymede Knightmare Frame with the support of the Ashford Foundation, which was then a contender in the development of the first Knightmare Frame prototypes. Bismarck Waldstein claims that the only person he had to use his Geass against before Suzaku was Marianne, which shows that she must have been particularly skilled. When Lelouch was a child, she was assassinated within the Aries Palace, purportedly by terrorists, and the culprits were never found. The fact that the impenetrable security of the palace was powerless is what convinced Lelouch that her murder was no random act of terrorism.

character.name: Bismarck Waldstein
character.description: Bismarck Waldstein is a man who bears the title of the Knight of One under Charles, the strongest amongst the Knights of the Round. He pilots the Knightmare Frame Galahad, and keeps one of his eyes hidden. Despite his status and combat abilities, he believes that war should be used as a last resort, and also sees strength without restraint as needless violence.

character.name: Chougasshuukoku
character.description: After the collapse of the E.U. and the revolt in the Chinese Federation, most of the territories not under the control of the Britannian Empire formed a loose coalition of states to contain Britannian expansion, known as the United Federation of Nations (UFN). The UFN is composed of forty-seven countries spread across parts of Central and Eastern Europe, Eastern Africa, and the majority of the Asian continent. Decisions are decided by a two-thirds majority vote by the leaders of each country, voting percentage being proportional to population. Member nations have no national armies: all armed forces they may have had are subsumed under the Black Knights, which became the military arm of the Federation.

character.name: Ashford Gakuen
character.description: The Ashford Academy is a Britannian private academy in Tokyo, owned and operated by the Ashford Foundation. It is attended by Lelouch and Nunnally, who, owing to their mother`s relationship with the Foundation, have been granted free residence in the campus` student club house.

character.name: Gino Weinberg
character.description: Gino Weinberg is the Knight of Three, a seventeen year-old Knightmare Frame pilot who comes from a noble family. He has lived a rather sheltered life as his family is very wealthy, and as such displays naïveté with how the world really works. To remedy this, he enrolls in Ashford Academy along with Anya Alstreim. He has a very cheerful personality and friendly demeanor. He pilots the transformable Knightmare Frame Tristan.

character.name: Luciano Bradley
character.description: Luciano Bradley is the Knight of Ten, and is known by the sobriquet "the Vampire of Britannia". A violent and confrontational man, he is fond of antagonizing others and attacking without provocation; several of the Knights of the Round appear to dislike him. He shows little care for the lives he ends, be they friend or foe, as long as he can cause destruction. In fact, he fights battles specifically because it allows him to freely kill people in public, even attempting to sacrifice his allies for a fleeting tactical advantage. He claims to be a "homicide genius", and carries a number of large knives which he is adept at throwing. He is fiercely loyal to the Empire, but he does as he pleases most of the time, even around members of the Imperial family. He pilots the Knightmare Frame Percival.

character.name: Lancelot Conquista
character.description: The Lancelot Conquista is an upgraded version of the Lancelot used by Knight of Seven Kururugi Suzaku. The Conquista is heavily damaged during the second battle of the Tokyo Settlement, after its encounter with the Guren S.E.I.T.E.N. Eight Elements.

character.name: Lancelot Albion
character.description: The Lancelot Albion is the final version of the Lancelot used by Knight of Seven Kururugi Suzaku.

character.name: Monica Kruszewski
character.description: Monica Kruszewski is a member of the Knights of the Round and is the Knight of Twelve.

character.name: Avalon
character.description: The Avalon is one of the primary flagships used by the Britannian side throughout the series.

episode.title: 魔神 が 目覚める 日
The Day a Demon Awakens
Le Jour de l`Eveil du Démon
Il giorno in cui si risvegliò il demonio
O dia em que o demônio acordou
Diena, Kai Demonas Prabudo
Şeytanın Uyandığı Gün
Majin ga Mezameru Hi
episode.summary: It’s a year after the battle between the Black Knights and the Britannian army. Zero is dead, and only a handful of Black Knights remain. But Lelouch is alive with no memory of the last year. Is it a trick or all part of a greater plan? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 日本独立計画
Plan for Independent Japan
Plan pour un Japon indépendant
Piano per l`indipendenza del Giappone
O plano para a independência do Japão
Japonijos Nepriklausomybės Planas
Japon Bağımsızlık Planı
Nihon Dokuritsu Keikaku
episode.summary: With his memories back, Lelouch brings Zero to life once more. But there’s a year’s worth of work to rebuild and still many unknown variables. What new advantages will the Britannian army have against them, and is Zero up to the task to face them again? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚われの学園
Imprisoned in Campus
En prison à l`Académie
La presa dell`isituto scolastico
Prisão Na Academia!
Įkalintoji Akademija
Kampüste Hapis
Toraware no Gakuen
episode.summary: Lelouch tries to get clues about Nunnally’s whereabouts, but no one around him remembers her. To find her, he’ll have to figure out his mysterious new brother, Rolo. But he’ll have to do it while maintaining the guise that his memory hasn’t returned. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆襲の処刑台
Counterattack at the Gallows
Contre-attaque sur l`échafaud
Il patibolo del contrattacco
Contra-ataque no patíbulo
Kontrataka Per Egzekuciją
Darağacında Karşı Saldırı
Gyakushuu no Shokeidai
episode.summary: Lelouch only has a short time to save the imprisoned Black Knights and regain his followers. But he also needs to figure out Rolo and his role in Britannian’s game. Will this boy and his Geass keep Lelouch from bringing back the Black Knights? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナイト オブ ラウンズ
Knights of the Round
Les Chevaliers de la Table Ronde
Knight of rounds
Knights Of Rounds!
Apvaliojo Stalo Riteris
Knight of Rounds
episode.summary: Suzaku returns to Ashford Academy to monitor Lelouch, determined to see if the other has regained his memories. Lelouch must take more care around the Britannian soldier. But when Suzaku plays an unexpected card, Lelouch’s guard may fall to pieces. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 太平洋 奇襲 作戦
Surprise Attack over the Pacific
Guet-Apens au-dessus du Pacifique
Operazione “Attacco a Sorpresa” sull’Oceano Pacifico
Plano para um ataque surpresa no Oceano Pacífico
Ramiojo Vandenyno Pasalos Operacija
Taiheiyou Kishuu Sakusen
episode.summary: Nunnally is set to be the new Viceroy of Area 11, and Lelouch will take every chance to get her back. But the reunion he wants may not go quite as planned. Has Nunnally chosen Suzaku over her beloved brother? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 棄てられた 仮面
The Abandoned Mask
Le masque abandonné
Giù la maschera
A Máscara Descartada!
Palikta Kaukė
Suterareta Kamen
episode.summary: When Nunnally reveals her plans on starting the Nippon special zone again, Lelouch realizes that he may no longer be needed at her side. Has Zero’s purpose been lost? Has the time come to drop the mask and stop his game? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百万のキセキ
One Million Miracles
Un million de miracles
Un milione di miracoli
